simrun3.robust_dask_delayed_execution

Functions

get_lock(name)

Classes

RobustDaskDelayedExecution(mdb)

This class utilizes a managed folder to store delayed objects.
class simrun3.robust_dask_delayed_execution.RobustDaskDelayedExecution(mdb)[source]

Bases: object

This class utilizes a managed folder to store delayed objects. It offers methods to run them exactly once. The return value is not saved. Common usecase: Long runing, data generating simulations are aborted (timeout on cluster, some error, …) and you want to complete the remaining tasks.
